DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study was to examine the immediate effect of subliminal priming with subliminal reward stimuli on standing balance in healthy young adults. The study also compared the outcomes with the immediate effects of subliminal priming with supraliminal reward stimuli.
DOC.brief_title: Immediate Effect of Subliminal Priming With Subliminal Reward Stimuli on Standing Balance in Healthy Young Adults
DOC.criteria: 1. Healthy volunteers between 18 and 24 years of age 2. Males and Females 1. Physical impairment, hindering performance of daily activities
